org.inf.nepalicalendar

Class FiscalYear

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.inf.nepalicalendar.FiscalYear

  • public class FiscalYear
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class FiscalYear, defines the nepali fiscal year. basically just a new datatype to hold all the informations we need for a fiscal year.
